/usr/bin/cc   -g -pg -O2 -g -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/plydg_Post.dir/xf_Post.c.o CMakeFiles/plydg_Post.dir/xf_Arg.c.o CMakeFiles/plydg_Post.dir/xf_MRCommon.c.o CMakeFiles/plydg_Post.dir/__/src/xf_EqnSetHook.c.o  -o ../bin/plydg_Post -rdynamic -ldl ../lib/libxfParallel.a /share/apps/mvapich2/2.1rc1-intel-15/lib/libmpi.so /share/apps/lib/parmetis/4.0.3/mvapich2-2.1rc1-intel-15/lib/libparmetis.a /share/apps/lib/parmetis/4.0.3/mvapich2-2.1rc1-intel-15/lib/libmetis.a -lm -lblas -llapack -lblas -llapack -Wl,-rpath,/share/apps/mvapich2/2.1rc1-intel-15/lib:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
